Signatures.Label: Left(text, num_chars)
Signatures.Documentation: Returns the specified number of characters from the start of a text value.

Parameters.Label: text
Parameters.Documentation: A text value to extract characters from.

Parameters.Label: num_chars
Parameters.Documentation: The number of characters to extract.

Signatures.Label: Left(text, num_chars)
Signatures.Documentation: Returns a column containing the specified number of characters from the start of the text value evaluated per row within the specified table or collection.

Parameters.Label: text
Parameters.Documentation: A text value to extract characters from.

Parameters.Label: num_chars
Parameters.Documentation: The number of characters to extract.

Signatures.Label: Left(text_column, num_chars)
Signatures.Documentation: Returns a column containing the specified number of characters from the start of the text value evaluated per row within the specified table or collection.

Parameters.Label: text_column
Parameters.Documentation: A column of text values to extract characters from.

Parameters.Label: num_chars
Parameters.Documentation: The number of characters to extract.
